original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close down, rupee weaker
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed down, dealers said while the spot next US dollar closed at 328.50/330.00 rupees.
The rupee opened at 326.75/328.00 rupees to the spot US dollar.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed down at 14.75/85 from Friday’s 14.90/15.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 closed down at 15.00/15 from Friday’s 15.10/15.15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed down 15.35/40 from Friday’s 15.40/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 slightly up 15.60/90 after Friday’s15.50/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 16.00/20 from Friday’s 16.00/25 percent.  (Colombo/July24/2023 – Corrected)
